item.description:
Join The Exemplar Entrepreneurs for an AWESOME evening with Rob Kanzer:

Whether you suffer from the cold sweat and loathing or you simply want to be more engaging with your audiences and clients -
Life and Business Coach Rob Kanzer can help.

In this Introduction to "The Power of Persuasion" we start with the basics. Your ability to connect and engage your listeners, starts with your own passion and beliefs. Please bring your notes and pictures of the message you want to convey with a willingness to try some really fun ways to unleash both the emotional intelligence of your message and its content. (The first respondents how contact Mr. Kanzer, may be eligible for some brief, free coaching prior to our gathering.)
This evening itself will be one of engagement. Both challenging and safe, you will take on writing exercises, paired learnings and Stand and Deliver Practice Piece all combine to have you learn, feel and give voice to your message.

Rob Kanzer, President of The Cambridge Coaching Collaborative, since 1981 continues to provide powerful. life changing improvements for those companies and individuals that seek true personal and professional transformation. A successful entrepreneur in his own right Rob is a Crisis Intervention Counselor, certified mediator and Master Presenter. He combines traditional and his own "true life curriculum" that you can adapt to your own needs.
Visit /call www.RobKanzer.com (RobKanzer@RobKanzer.com)

Seating is limited, so please remember to RSVP Today!
item.name: Giving Compelling Presentations: Find Your Voice and Turn Fear into Success
